create_service_entry.request_description: User requests a service entry be added following a completed service on a fleet vehicle. May reference an invoice or receipt from the service performed.
create_service_entry.required_data: You must be able to determine the vehicle, services performed, mileage, and costs from the user's request

create_fuel_entry.request_description: Submits a fuel entry for a vehicle based on user input
create_fuel_entry.required_data: You must be able to determine the vehicle, fuel type, quantity, mileage, and cost from the users request

create_meter_entry.request_description: Submits a meter entry for a vehicle based on user input
create_meter_entry.required_data: You must be able to determine the vehicle, meter type, and meter reading from the users request
